title: RHOBH Secrets Revealed! + RHONY Reunion Part 3 & Christopher Lowell!
itunes:title: RHOBH Secrets Revealed! + RHONY Reunion Part 3 & Christopher Lowell!
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps the final episode of this season's Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. Our baby's secrets were revealed, and it is also Teddi's last appearance as a housewife! The Real Housewives of New York also wraps up part 3 of the reunio...
description:
Danny recaps the final episode of this season's Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. Our baby's secrets were revealed, and it is also Teddi's last appearance as a housewife! The Real Housewives of New York also wraps up part 3 of the reunion. After all the Housewives talk, Danny welcomes Emmy-winner Christopher Lowell, previously the host of Discovery's Christopher Lowell Show and Interior Motives. He updates us on what he's up to now, and his work in the early aughts!


Christopher Lowell Interview: 27:06ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
